price: ߏ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߜߘߍ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߝߍ߬ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߝߌ߬ߟߊ ߦߴߊ߬ ߝߎ߬ߝߎ߫ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ߬ ߜߍߟߍ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fa-alqiyāhu fī al-ʿadhābi al-shadīdi
